lender.loan_because: as a great leader once said, "Do not wait for leaders; do it alone, person to person".

lender.occupational_info: I have started or purchased 7 different businesses. I enjoy working and starting new business. I hope to drill water wells in countries that do not have adequate clean drinking water.

May they spread that to others as well. Remember: "When one has gained the trust of an individual, they have gained the whole world".
lender.occupational_info: I bring business and lenders / investors together. My goal and idea: " By making non-profits, profitable".

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: Dr. Loretta Scott says it better than I ever could - "We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone"

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because:
While I don't always have alot of spare money, and things occasionally get tight, there are people in the world that could do with a small helping hand.
Donating money to those trying to help themselves fits well with the adage "You can give a man a fish which will feed him for one meal, or you can teach a man to fish and he can feed himself forever".
People helping themselves to improve their lives means that they will always have something to fall back on.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for ensuring the safety of people that I work with. Protecting them from potential threats and looking after and guiding them when they need help.

lender.name: Rob Barham
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.

lender.occupational_info: I am a retired elementary school teacher.

lender.name: LACkS
lender.loan_because: "Above all, try always to be able to feel deeply any injustice committed against any person in any part of the world. It is the most beautiful quality of a revolutionary"

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I have seen the poverty of the third world as well as that of my own country. I have had the good fortune of people reaching out to help me and so it is incumbent on us to do the same.

lender.name: Bag Ladies Life Group
lender.loan_because: We are a Life Group from Life Center Church in Washington State. We decided to loan through KIVA because we were reading "The Hole in our Gospel" by Richard Stearns, the CEO of World Vision. We had heard about KIVA and we decided our extra funds could be put to God's use by donating there.
lender.occupational_info: Some of us are retired, some are disabled and some are working or getting ready to go back to school to improve our work skills. We are a varied and loveing group of women who try our best to learn from the Lord and do His Will in our lives and show love and caring to all His people.

lender.occupational_info: I'm working in a brain research team. Currently we're trying to understand how things you hear interact with things you see in the brain. Before that I was working on a genetic brain disease called Huntington's Disease.

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: I think micro-loans are a perfect way to share all I have, and enable people to help themselves and benefit their communities.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I help Canadians get into homes & see how fortunate we are. I'd like to help people in other countries so they too can create a better life.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I feel that the absolute best way to help poor people leave poverty is with micro lending. Handouts are a temporary band aid...but building a business can provide for a lifetime.
lender.occupational_info: I spend most of my time at a desk checking over manufacturing data for printed circuit boards.

lender.name: Robin & Kim

lender.name: Zak

lender.name: Ravi
lender.loan_because: I want to be a Difference Maker and a Game Changer.

lender.occupational_info: i play a very small role in helping find a preventive vaccine for dengue, a disease transmitted by mosquitos.

lender.name: Silas
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people in the world and I feel very good when I do. I hope the people who get this loan think of me as a good person.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in 5th grade so I don't work except for homework and chores at home.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently a student in Boston, Massachusetts and am studying to be a Special Education teacher. I volunteer working with children with learning disabilities, as well as bringing smiles to local elderly.

lender.name: Katie Jane
lender.loan_because: I am aware, and not in some statistical sense. I am aware of the value of a human, and too often I forget how much I take that for granted. I loan because I want to help a single human, and to initiate that change for a better life for someone. Perhaps if everyone gave a moment of their time to make this change for one person in the world, it would have an amazing impact!?
lender.occupational_info: I am given the most amazing opportunity to learn everyday by going to school.

lender.name: M & J
lender.loan_because: We believe in helping others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We work in international higher education bringing students to the US to study.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because:
I am a Christian and minister's wife and this scripture really speaks to my heart:
Matthew 25:34-36 "Then the King will say to those on his right, 'Come, you who are blessed by my Father; take your inheritance, the kingdom prepared for you since the creation of the world. For I was hungry and you gave me something to eat, I was thirsty and you gave me something to drink, I was a stranger and you invited me in, I needed clothes and you clothed me, I was sick and you looked after me, I was in prison and you came to visit me.'
If some of my money could help a person be able to support themselves and their family, my question is "How could you NOT do this." I don't even care if I get the money back, because to me it's not about that.
lender.occupational_info: I have several jobs, I am a church secretary, and I care for people in their homes cleaning etc. so they can stay in their homes. I am also the youth and children's minister in my church (volunteer work). It's a very small church and by most standards my husband and I are low income, but who can't afford $25.00 at a time????

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I study chemistry.

lender.name: Jolleen
lender.loan_because: i want to help other become successful in life!
lender.occupational_info: Remove Dead Trees, Help our townships keep a safe and clear road ways for travelers.
